hypothesis_content.title: CLARITY Act News-Driven Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, when the 20-day BTC realized volatility drops below 40% (compression) AND a major U.S. crypto regulatory headline (e.g., CLARITY Act progress) is released, a long volatility position entered at the NY open following the news will generate positive alpha over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes with low volatility indicate pent-up energy and indecision. Major regulatory news acts as a catalyst to resolve this indecision, triggering a directional move. The NY open provides liquidity and incorporates overnight global reaction.
entry_conditions: Major U.S. crypto regulatory news event detected (headline score > 0.7 via NLP)
Enter long BTC at NYSE open (09:30 ET) on first trading day after news

exit_conditions.take_profit: Position held for 5 trading days, then close at market

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 5-day return after such events is not statistically greater than zero (p > 0.1) or is negative.
